title: Symbiotica
description:
SYMBIOTICA is the podcast and newsletter of BEAM, a creative studio for climate innovation. I built its identity and web system to stand on its own while still belonging to the BEAM-verseâ€”balancing high-tech futurism with archival memory to create an immersive, cinematic space for exploring the future of climate design.

This project was developed in collaboration with BEAM over the course of 6 months. The world of Symbiotica is influenced by the texture of classical scientific photography and analog music mechanisms, overlaid with our distinctly digital interfaces.

In addition to my direction and branding work, I designed and implemented Symbiotica's bespoke website, which takes inspiration from analog hi-fi (music) technology with the help of AI tools like Claude and ChatGPT to bring my work to life.
